name: Palpitator
description:
Palpitator is a game where you swap and switch pieces to combine matches of three or more. However, there's a twist.

The board has completely changed! What happened? Are you going to let that stop you? Of course not!

Within the beat of the music, the music periodically changes the board, but it's no big deal since you're all ready to boogie!

..Right?
